title: Friends in Common
description: (Suncoast Society series book #64)[MM, MF, BDSM]Playing a friendly game of “Who’s on Top” is just another day in Max, Sean, and Cali’s life. And when it comes to their friends, the triad are usually the first ones there, pitching in and stepping up to help.Unfortunately, there are some things they can’t fix for their friends. The trick is to recognize that boundary while not forgetting how to have fun or neglecting their own happiness.But sometimes, even Cali can make a T-Rex look tame.
author: Tymber Dalton
